text: Marion Maréchal-Le Pen (born 10 December 1989) is a French politician. In 2024, she became a Member of the European Parliament. She is the granddaughter of Jean-Marie Le Pen and the niece of Marine Le Pen. She is a member of Reconquête and an MP for Vaucluse's 3rd constituency from 2012 until 2017. Twenty-two years old at the time of her election, she became France's youngest MP in modern political history before Tematai Le Gayic's election in 2022. == References == Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:National Front (France) politicians Category:Politicians from Hauts-de-Seine Category:MEPs for France
title: Marion Maréchal
